      (package private) boardgame.Move alphaBetaSearch(tablut.TablutBoardState boardState)
      Minimax algorithm with alpha-beta pruning Depth-first exploration of game tree - simulates each move and evaluates the outcome when the leaves are reached Assumes opponent plays to minimise utility.

      Under certain conditions min/max terminate early: 1) if the (simulated) game has been won -> returns max_utility if StudentPlayer wins 2) if a root has been reached -> calls heuristic function @see student_player.StudentPlayer#evaluation(TablutBoardState)
